TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Ciku, title = Ciku, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ciku} }

S.FORM: Ciku Itiniay i Hualien Cen no Hualien ko Ciku a niyaro', 2,828 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 6,794 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 58 ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 3,939 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 42 ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 2,855 ko tamdaw. O pa sin to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis37 , Bunun4 , Tayal3 , Paiwan2 , Truku8 , Puyuma1 , Sakizaya1 , roma1 . Ira ko imeng i niyaro'. Ira ko kofa( , ) i niyaro'.
